cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to -1 (must be non-negative) will cause cell ID configuration failure and prevent cell identification.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSymbols to 15 (valid range 0-13) will cause TDD configuration validation failure and prevent uplink symbol allocation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSymbols 設定為 15（有效範圍 0-13）會導致 TDD 配置驗證失敗，並阻止上行鏈路符號分配。
